segments.text: I notice the boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s standing on a stool that looks like it’s about to tip over, but he doesn’t seem scared.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him looks so hopeful, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe the woman hasn’t noticed the water overflowing all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even glance at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s just really focused or completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, it’s almost funny compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt with all this water and climbing going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn them, but something tells me they wouldn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR
